name: gigachat
description: Веб-приложение для общения с GigaChat от Сбера

scripts.init: npm i concurrently && concurrently -n CLIENT,SERVER -c blue,yellow "cd ./client && npm i --force" "cd ./server && npm i --force"
scripts.start: concurrently -n CLIENT,SERVER -c blue,yellow "cd ./client && npm start" "cd ./server && npm run dev"
scripts.lint:project: concurrently -n Prettier,ESlint,Stylelint -c blue,yellow,green "cd ./client && npm run prettier" "npm run lint:ts" "npm run lint:scss"
